about_the_game:
BLIXIA is an Explore-RPG where you can expect casual gameplay in a fantasy world.

The Adventure begins here!

Explore the world of BLIXIA and forge your own path. Decide where to journey and how to explore.

Equip weapons and armor that match your playstyle, growing stronger and more powerful. Choose diverse spells to help you overcome challenges throughout your adventure.

Face enemies ranging from easy to challenging, uncover hidden locations, and collect rare treasures to enhance your journey.

As you travel, gather resources to craft even more powerful items. Meet traders who might have rare and useful goods for sale—if you're lucky!

Cross paths with characters offering quests to help you on your adventure.

[Key Features]

Explore: Embark on an epic journey through a beautifully crafted realm, unearth ancient secrets, and brave the depths of mystical caves and other enchanting locales.

Combat: Choose your fighting style with a variety of weapons. Engage up close, attack from a distance, or cast powerful magic to defeat your enemies.

Crafting & Gathering: Gather essential resources and visit crafting stations to forge powerful items for your journey.

Quest: Find quests, complete them, and who knows? You might just stumble upon something extraordinary!

[Other Features]

  • Day & Night Cycle

  • Shops with Favor Feature

  • And more is coming..

BLIXIA is made my Micho Schmidt (Solo Dev).

Don’t forget to wishlist and follow!
